MediaCapabilitiesEncodingInfo.summary:
The encodingInfo() method of the interface returns a promise that fulfills with the tested media configuration's capabilities for encoding media.
This contains the three boolean properties supported, smooth, and powerefficient, which describe how compatible the device is with the type of media.
MediaCapabilitiesEncodingInfo.returns:
A fulfilling with an object containing three Boolean attributes:Browsers will report a supported media configuration as smooth and powerEfficient until stats on this device have been recorded.
All supported audio codecs are reported to be power efficient.
